per_day_breakdown.title: Goa Coastal Charm & Sunset
activities: Arrive at Goa and check into accommodation
Relax and swim at Palolem Beach
Enjoy a fresh seafood lunch at a beach shack
Explore local markets or a nearby temple
Experience a serene sunset cruise on the Mandovi River
Dine at a highly-rated local restaurant with live music
Optional: Visit a lively beach bar for a nightcap

summary: This one-day itinerary for a solo traveler to Goa focuses on experiencing the essence of its southern beaches, local cuisine, and a memorable sunset cruise. With a comfortable budget, it allows for relaxation, good food, and a taste of Goa's vibrant atmosphere, ensuring a delightful escape.
